snippet: A spending bill signed by President Obama last week includes a review process intended to limit cyberattacks linked to the Chinese government.
lead_paragraph: A spending bill signed by President Obama last week includes a review process intended to limit cyberattacks linked to the Chinese government.

headline.main: China Criticizes U.S. Government Curbs on Foreign Technology Purchases
headline.print_headline: China Criticizes U.S. Government Curbs on Foreign Technology Purchases
